lessonGuidance: The outsides of the grid have fewer surrounding tiles, meaning you will have less information about where the mines are.
This means that 50/50s usually occur around the edges of the grid.
The best strategy is to start in the center of the grid and work your way outwards.
If an area is currently impossible to solve, work on other sections as it can sometimes reveal more information on the hard section by removing possible 50/50s.
